experiences.title: Junior Front-End Developer
experiences.subtitle: Analiz Systems Ozgu Ltd.
workDescription: Created various email designs using Html and Inline CSS, through given design preferences and colour choices.

Gaining experience using react and JavaScript in a work environment, along with developing solutions/designs for tasks given through the Workspace in Click Up and sending Pull Requests through Azure DevOps.
Able to work alongside backend developers, to gain information about which functions is used to get certain information from the database, and then fetch them accordingly.

Able to correctly identify errors, by looking at what is being returned in the network, and if the data is correctly being set to certain values using the console (from time to time, I also use react dev tools).

experiences.title: Gap Year
experiences.subtitle: Mental Health Recovery
workDescription: After undergoing an emergency surgery in January 2022, which happened during my last year of University , I recognized the importance of prioritizing my mental and emotional recovery. Understanding the significance of taking time for self-care, I made the decision to embark on a gap year to fully recuperate and regain a sense of balance in my life.

During this gap year, I dedicated myself to a holistic healing process, focusing on both physical and mental well-being. I engaged in various activities and practices that promoted relaxation, personal growth, and self-reflection.

Ultimately, the gap year served as a transformative period of healing, growth, and self-care. It provided the necessary space and time to recover from the physical and emotional impact of the surgery, enabling me to return to my professional pursuits with renewed focus, energy, and mental well-being.

experiences.title: Retail Cashier
experiences.subtitle: M & S Dry Cleaners
workDescription: Managed cash transactions and operated the cash register with accuracy and efficiency.
Assisted customers in dropping off and picking up their garments, providing excellent customer service.
Maintained a clean and organized cashier area, ensuring smooth customer flow.
Addressed customer inquiries, resolved issues, and provided information on services.

experiences.title: Computer Science Tutoring
experiences.subtitle: Helping Fellow Students
workDescription: Tutoring in varying subtopics such as Python, JavaScript, SQL and many more.
Adapting my teaching skills to best suit the students’ needs
Keeping up to date on any changes to the curriculum to ensure correct content is taught.
Offering flexibility to student demand and requirements
Arranging test-based scenarios to ensure learning has been consolidated.

experiences.title: Work Shadowing Santander
experiences.subtitle: Santander
workDescription: Observed how the employees handled their job.
Delivered excellent customer service in a professional and efficient manner.
Communicated with customers via phone and face to face.
Educated customers on any questions they had. Clarified any issue customers had and explained the best solution.
Keeping and maintaining records using organizational and management skills and delivered before managers expectation.
